entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow. Local amount 2 cm near the Rockies. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow. Local amount 2 cm except 4 cm near the Rockies. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
